title: Citibank pamphlet design
description: Long, vertical page split into three registers. Top register is thin white strip with "Product and Market Managers" written, aligned bottom left, in gray sans-serif text. Bottom register is identical to top without text. Central register contains central citibank logo against gray ground. The logo depicts a four-pointed star within a horizontal oval. Oval's top third is gray with thick red line underneath. Bottom two thirds is black. In middle register, directly above right side of bottom register is Citibank logotype and logo rendered in white caps.
name: Print
